method.name: _initacsearchviewdark
method.comment: Use this sub when use ACToolBarDark and ACSearchView NOTE:Initialize SearchView before this sub. Example: Private sv As ACSearchView sv.Initialize("search") ToolBar.Title = "پارس تولبار" ToolBar.SubTitle=" تولبار و سرچ ویو راستچین" Dim PRTL As ParsRTLToolbar PRTL.InitACSearchViewDark(ToolBar,sv,15,Typeface.LoadFromAssets("IRAN.ttf"),Colors.White) PRTL.TitleACToolBarLight(ToolBar,14,Typeface.LoadFromAssets("IRAN.ttf"),Colors.White) ToolBar.NavigationIconDrawable=xml.GetDrawable("ic_menu_white_24dp")

method.name: _initacsearchviewlight
method.comment: Use this sub when use ACToolBarLight and ACSearchView NOTE:Initialize SearchView before this sub. Example: Private sv As ACSearchView sv.Initialize("search") ToolBar.Title = "پارس تولبار" ToolBar.SubTitle=" تولبار و سرچ ویو راستچین" Dim PRTL As ParsRTLToolbar PRTL.InitACSearchViewLight(ToolBar,sv,15,Typeface.LoadFromAssets("IRAN.ttf"),Colors.White) PRTL.TitleACToolBarLight(ToolBar,14,Typeface.LoadFromAssets("IRAN.ttf"),Colors.White) ToolBar.NavigationIconDrawable=xml.GetDrawable("ic_menu_white_24dp")

method.name: _initactoolbardark
method.comment: Use this sub when use ACToolBarDark Example: ToolBar.Title = "پارس تولبار" ToolBar.SubTitle=" تولبار و سرچ ویو راستچین" Dim PRTL As ParsRTLToolbar PRTL.InitACToolBarLight(ToolBar) PRTL.TitleACToolBarLight(ToolBar,14,Typeface.LoadFromAssets("IRAN.ttf"),Colors.White) ToolBar.NavigationIconDrawable=xml.GetDrawable("ic_menu_white_24dp")

method.name: _initactoolbarlight
method.comment: Use this sub when use ACToolBarLight Example: ToolBar.Title = "پارس تولبار" ToolBar.SubTitle=" تولبار و سرچ ویو راستچین" Dim PRTL As ParsRTLToolbar PRTL.InitACToolBarLight(ToolBar) PRTL.TitleACToolBarLight(ToolBar,14,Typeface.LoadFromAssets("IRAN.ttf"),Colors.White) ToolBar.NavigationIconDrawable=xml.GetDrawable("ic_menu_white_24dp")

method.name: _titleactoolbardark
method.comment: Use this sub to customize Title and SubTitle of ACToolBarDark Example: ToolBar.Title = "پارس تولبار" ToolBar.SubTitle=" تولبار و سرچ ویو راستچین" Dim PRTL As ParsRTLToolbar PRTL.TitleACToolBarDark(ToolBar,14,Typeface.LoadFromAssets("IRAN.ttf"),Colors.White)

method.name: _titleactoolbarlight
method.comment: Use this sub to customize Title and SubTitle of ACToolBarLight Example: ToolBar.Title = "پارس تولبار" ToolBar.SubTitle=" تولبار و سرچ ویو راستچین" Dim PRTL As ParsRTLToolbar PRTL.TitleACToolBarLight(ToolBar,14,Typeface.LoadFromAssets("IRAN.ttf"),Colors.White)

method.name: _xlibraryinformation
method.comment: Library Author:ME_Esmaiel Shafiee Library Name:ParsRTLToolbar Library Version:1.0.0 Good Luck
